forecast.day_comments: Rain or freezing rain before 4am, then a chance of rain, snow showers, and freezing rain between 4am and 5am, then a chance of rain after 5am.  Low around 32. Southeast wind 5 to 9 mph becoming light.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total nighttime ice accumulation of 0.1 to 0.2 of an inch possible.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
